title: Super Agent Steinberg on What Makes a Franchise QB
itunes:title: Super Agent Steinberg on What Makes a Franchise QB
description:
He's one of the most decorated sports agents of all time, representing athletes like Steve Young, Troy Aikman, Lennox Lewis, and more recently Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes. Leigh Steinberg joins Jason, Lynch, and Barr to discuss Mahomes' record breaking contract extension, Leigh's struggle with alcoholism, and his incredible comeback story.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
